H0.text: As at March 2001, who holds the record for scoring the most league goals for the soccer team Arsenal. Thierry Henry

H1.text: As at March 2001, who holds the record for scoring the most league goals for the soccer team Arsenal. Dennis Bergkamp

H2.text: As at March 2001, who holds the record for scoring the most league goals for the soccer team Arsenal. Cliff Bastin

H3.text: As at March 2001, who holds the record for scoring the most league goals for the soccer team Arsenal. Mr Wright

A4.text: Bastin's tally of 178 goals made him Arsenal's all-time top goalscorer from 1939 until 1997, when his total was surpassed by Ian Wright.

A5.text: Bastin's record of 150 league goals for Arsenal stood for slightly longer, being equalled by Henry on 14 January 2006 and surpassed by him in February of the same year.
